name: Mill Multiverse
description:
Mill Multiverse is a casual & challenging 3D Roll ball game.

Get ready to roll, jump, dodge, balance
...and Explore the "UNEXPLORED" place.

Play  & have fun with unique 10  levels.
Experience variety of obstacles and difficulties in each level.

Note: Game is playable on only Window platform 

Game size= 301 mb

Make sure to install UE4PrereqSetup_x64 before playing game.

UE4PrereqSetup_x64 is located in this directory: Mill Multiverse\Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us
